abstract_ssm: Collection consists of newsletters, press releases, brochures, and other ephemeral material, from organizations based in the United States that advocated for the sovereignty and rights of the Palestinian people.  These materials were collected by Colin Edwards, a Welsh-born journalist based in the San Francisco Bay Area in the 1970s and 1980s.
corpname_ssm: NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections
